name: HikingSounds
0:
”Alexa open Hiking Sounds”
”Alexa ask Hiking Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hiking sounds
des:
Recreate the immersive experience of a hike through nature with this skill. From the crunch of leaves underfoot to the murmur of a nearby stream and the calls of wildlife, it brings the therapeutic effects of the outdoors into your living space.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Hiking Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
